return msg;

profile = {

  "followingID": [
    22,
    33,
    44,
    55,
    666
  ],

    999,
    4444,
    44,
    234
  ],
  "coverURI": msg.payload.coverURI,
  "media": [
    {
      "icon": "fb.png",
      "link": "www.facebook.com/niksaoul"
    }
  ],
  "playlists": [
    {
      "playlistID": 123456,
      "title": "A playlist that wants to be adored",
      "userID": 123,
      "coverURI": "https://mob/media/File:Adored_playlist_cover.jpg",
      "description": "Sometimes I fantasise when the streets are cold and lonely",
      "songs": [
        {
          "title": "Come together",
          "artist": "The Beatles",
          "album": "Abbey Road",

          "songID": 123456789,

      "isEmpty": false

  ],
  "isArtist": msg.payload.isArtist,
  "userID": msg.payload.userID,
  "email": "niksaoul@mob.com"
}
msg.payload=profile;
return msg;

name: Follow someone.This userID provided is added in the FollowingID array.
Unfollow someone.Delete the userID of the User you want to unfollow from the FollowingsID array.
Return profile with updated followingID
Return profile with updated followersID
Someone followed you.The userID of the user who follows you is added in the FollowersID array.
Someone unfollowed you. Remove this followerID from your FollowersID array.
Return message

Invalid input.
Format the header and payload
func:
msg.headers = {
    "Content-Type": "multipart/form-data; boundary=------------------------d74496d66958873e"
}


msg.payload = '--------------------------d74496d66958873e\r\n'+
'Content-Disposition: form-data; name="select"\r\n'+
'\r\n'+
'true\r\n'+
'--------------------------d74496d66958873e\r\n'+
'Content-Disposition: form-data; name="print"\r\n'+
'\r\n'+
'true\r\n'+
'--------------------------d74496d66958873e\r\n'+
'Content-Disposition: form-data; name="file"; filename="'+msg.filename+'"\r\n'+
'Content-Type: application/octet-stream\r\n'+
'\r\n'+
msg.payload+'\r\n'+
'--------------------------d74496d66958873e--\r\n';
return msg;

name: Add song to Playlist
func:
newPlaylist = {
  "playlistID": 123456,
  "title": "A playlist that wants to be adored",
  "userID": 123,
  "coverURI": "string",
  "description": "Sometimes I fantasise when the streets are cold and lonely",
  "songs": [
    {
      "title": "Come together",
      "artist": "The Beatles",
      "album": "Abbey Road",
      "coverURI": "https://mob/media/File:AbbeyRoad_song_cover.jpg",
      "duration": 259,
      "songID": 123456789,
      "songURI": "string"
    },
    {
    "title": "Megalomania",
    "artist": "Muse",
    "album": "Origin of Symmetry",
    "coverURI": "https://mob/media/File:OriginOfSymmetry_song_cover.jpg",
    "duration": 259,
    "songID": msg.payload.songID,
    "songURI": "string"
    }
  ],
  "isPublic": true,
  "isEmpty": false
}
msg.payload = newPlaylist;
return msg
